history.content:
Data Science Consulting and Education | Big Data at Berkeley Recruitment

 

Interested in working with real-world clients on a data analytics and machine learning projects? Want to help teach high schoolers the fundamentals of data science?

 

Big Data at Berkeley is a data science organization dedicated to spreading data science principles to students throughout the Bay Area. We have 2 teams—education and projects. Our education division leads a 8-week data science bootcamp on campus for local high school students. Our projects division is working on developing cutting-edge data analytics projects with exciting, real-world clients. 

 

Apply by Wed, 9/9 at 11:59 PM PT at this link: http://bit.ly/fa20_generalapp, or stop by our info sessions this week on Thursday, 9/3 or Sunday, 9/6 from 6-8 PM PT if you would like to learn more! 


Please email bigdata.berkeley@gmail.com with any questions or visit our website at https://bd.berkeley.edu/. For more information on recruitment, feel free to follow our Facebook page: fb.me/bigdata.berkeley. We look forward to working with you!
history.subject: Join Big Data at Berkeley
